entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sioux Lookout
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:54 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -32.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sioux Lookout Airport 02:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 76 %

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late in the evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
